p: Among the naturally occurring compounds and beyond, flavonoids ( Figure 17) are particularly studied [ 129], including their role versus SARS-CoV-2 [ 130]. Many in-silico screenings of medicinal plant databases against SARS-CoV-2 druggable targets have been carried out [ 131, 132]. Indeed, analyzing the potential role of the flavonoids against SARS-CoV-2 main protease [ 133], it was noticed that their inhibitory activity was more extensive than that of the peptide-derived inhibitors [ 134]. Starting from this rationale, a thorough investigation was focused on the common pharmacophoric features of flavonoids.
